TEXT.English: Bringing Confectioneries from all over the world to every corner of the world.
TEXT.French: Procure des Confiseries en provenance de tout le globe.
TEXT.German: Bringing Confectioneries from all over the world to every corner of the world.
TEXT.Italian: Bringing Confectioneries from all over the world to every corner of the world.
TEXT.Spanish: Bringing Confectioneries from all over the world to every corner of the world.

TEXT.English: A massive distributor of world's Confectioneries directly to your home city.
TEXT.French: Un grand disctributeur de confiseries du monde entier directement dans votre Ville.
TEXT.German: A massive distributor of world's Confectioneries directly to your home city.
TEXT.Italian: A massive distributor of world's Confectioneries directly to your home city.
TEXT.Spanish: A massive distributor of world's Confectioneries directly to your home city.

TEXT.English: Build this corporation in order to get Confectioneries bonuses.
TEXT.French: Construire cette corporations pour obtenir la ressource Confiseries.
TEXT.German: Build this corporation in order to get Confectioneries bonuses.
TEXT.Italian: Build this corporation in order to get Confectioneries bonuses.
TEXT.Spanish: Build this corporation in order to get Confectioneries bonuses.
